name: Moneyman and Pennyboy
description:
Note: Press R to restart a level, the mystical tutorial hobo forgot to mention that.

David Osh is one of the most despicable people on this planet, maybe even worse than corporate lawyers: By spending excessive amounts of money on pay-to-win mechanics in his favorite game, Battleshoot, he dominates its rankings. However, his life gets turned upside down when the "legendary gamer witch" turns out to be a sour loser and turns him into money! Will David become human again? Will he grow as a character? Will the Ludum Dare deadline keep killing everything it touches? All these things will be revealed in Moneyman and Pennyboy!

Controls for Windows/HTML5:

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - Escape
  • Jump (when possible) - A
  • Advance text/Talk - A
  • Reset Level - R
  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Fullscreen (Windows) - CTRL+Return
  • Fullscreen (Web) - There's a small button

Controls for Dreamcast (and controller):

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - A+B+X+Y+START (Standard Dreamcast return to title combo)
  • Jump (when possible)- A
  • Advance text/Talk - A
  • Reset Level - R
  • Movement- D-Pad or analog stick

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 29/04/2019
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/Moneyman/

Thanks for playing!
